original_text: My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue is the pen of a ready writer.
korean_text: 내 마음이 좋은 말로 왕을 위하여 지은 것을 말하리니 내 혀는 글솜씨가 뛰어난 서기관의 붓끝과 같도다

sentences.original_text: My heart is inditing a good matter
sentences.korean_translation: 내 마음이 좋은 일을 구상하고 있도다

sentences.original_text: I speak of the things which I have made
My tongue is the pen of a ready writer
sentences.korean_translation: 내 혀는 준비된 필사가의 펜과 같도다
